sourcesContent:
{{ exercise.name }}

Force: {{ exercise.force }}

Level: {{ exercise.level }}

Mechanic: {{ exercise.mechanic }}

Equipment: {{ exercise.equipment }}

Primary Muscles: {{ exercise.primaryMuscles.join(', ') }}

Secondary Muscles: {{ exercise.secondaryMuscles.join(', ') }}

Category: {{ exercise.category }}

Instructions:

  1. {{ instruction }}
import { Component, Input, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-exercise-details', templateUrl: './exercise-details.component.html', styleUrls: ['./exercise-details.component.scss'] }) export class ExerciseDetailsComponent implements OnInit { @Input() exercise: any; constructor() { } ngOnInit(): void { } }
